The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 August is 280,519 (498.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 18 August, there were 6,139 new confirmed cases (10.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 11 August, there were 6,505 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 6% (366 fewer cases).
